Module nelson.inventorysystemproject
Package nelson.inventorysystemproject

Class AddProductController

java.lang.Object
nelson.inventorysystemproject.AddProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddProductController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that dictates actions based on buttons or actions taken within the Add Product menu

    • addPartToProduct

      public void addPartToProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Adds new associated part to the new product and updates the associated part table
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - this is the action event parameter that constitutes pressing the add part button

    • removeAssociatedPart

      public void removeAssociatedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Removes associated part from new product Error message if no associated part chosen Confirmation message to confirm the removal of selected associated part
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - this is the action event parameter that constitutes pressing the remove button

    • saveProduct

      public void saveProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      New product saved to inventory product observable list Error message if no new name was chosen for product Error message if min, max and inventory have unrealistic values (i.e. max is less than min or inv is greater than max) Error message if non integers are entered in any text box excluding the name text box
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - this is the action event parameter that constitutes pressing the save button
      Throws:
      IOException - the function throws an exception for a runtime error

    • cancelAddProduct

      public void cancelAddProduct(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Transfer menu back to main menu and don't save inputed information
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - this is the action event parameter that constitutes pressing the cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException - the function throws an exception for a runtime error

    • goToMain

      public void goToMain(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Function to transfer current menu to the main menu
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - this is the action event parameter that constitutes pressing of any cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException - the function throws an exception for a runtime error

    • searchPart

      public void searchPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Searches parts in part table. For ID searches, shows exact matches highlighted For name searches, allows a partial name search, and shows all matching names Error message shown if no parts are found
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - this is the action event parameter that constitutes entering of text to search
